thread.title: Doom Editor Interface completly messed up.

post.author: RedRanger666
post.body: Dont how to describe the problem, interface is all over the place. Can see glances of my maps. Where you have your Z, XY, and Camera, theyre not showing, well some. For example the window for Z, this is showing what the Camera should be showing, XY is showing what Z would be showing and then camera window is showing Z's "output/feed" have not played around with the editor for at least a year. Im not sure if it has to do with me having the game on three of my hard drives (back up's, but plugged in). This is definetly a new kind of problem, i doubt that any one has had the same problem. If any of you smarter people have any clues, it would be appreciated. I hope it will be something "challenging". There are 2 pictures attached. Thank you for taking your time to help.

post.author: slush_puppy
post.body:
I had a similiar problem on 3 different occations. First was with AMD/ATI display drivers having issues with Catalyst A.I...2nd was with INTEL INTEGRATED Graphics which was a driver failure on their OpenGL drivers. And lastly was "noclip" command in the console did something like that to my editor. If I used "noclip" in the game and went to the editor it would mess up everything.

Never really fixed the problem just formatted my computer each time and reinstalled windows.

post.author: Sir Random
post.body: I had that problem too, and disabling my 'aero' desktop fixed it.

post.author: RedRanger666
post.body: I think i might just reinstall it. Still wonder why though... Thanks for trying.

post.author: Theftbot
post.body: Cant you just delete the editor.cfg file in the base folder to set it back to default settings?

post.author: RedRanger666
post.body: Smart answer mate. Ill give it a go. Thank you.

post.author: RedRanger666
post.body: Did not work... Tried Quake 4... Same problem, should probably see if it has anything to do with display...

post.author: RedRanger666
post.body: So i actually tried disabling aero... It worked... I disabled it through AVG... Thank you mate!!

post.author: gavavva
post.body:
You can't get the editor to work correctly unless you rihht click on the D3/Q4 .exe and set compatibility to Win XP. That disables Aero.

Its totally silly but hey-ho, they came out before Vista even.
